name: Kick Boxes (afaymats)
description:
Kick Boxes is a local 2-player competitive alien box kicking simulator.

Player 1 uses WASD to move.

Player 2 uses the arrow keys to move.

Kick the boxes into the opposing ship, the first player to accumulate 20 points wins!

Andrew Fay Matseas: Programmer

Adam Brochu: Art / Design

https://wildodyssey.itch.io/
